result.title: Change integer type in C++
result.content: Hi Codeforces, I ask for help. Can I make a variable which is int type, but when it overflow, it convert to long long type. For example I make an integer variable x. I give max integer value on x. When I add 1 to x, I do not want to overflow. I want to make ( auto convert to) long long and continue with next number. Is it possible? I am sorry if I ask a stupid question.
